name: Karrablast
description: The Clamping Pokémon. When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. This Pokémon targets Shelmet.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Any attack made by or against this Pokémon has advantage.
